data.text: @sallywhitwell Something really creepy about taking a photo from a distance of a complete stranger, whether they're wearing a mask or not!!!!
@LeeMars06082051 @sallywhitwell Yep, I'd call the cops too, but on the creep taking a photo of me!!!!

@sallywhitwell So often I feel like taking photos of people without their masks on but I know I’d get in trouble haha. 

P. S just had orchestra today. Still happy to chat if you’d like to :)
@sallywhitwell I'd call the cops. "Yes good morning sir, this lady is on the train without a mask, pls put her in prison"
She’s put her mask on now, cos other people got on the train...! Displays fundamental misunderstanding of how aerosol spread works. In enclosed areas, they’re floating around for a long while..
